price: 105. Kuwaasu waa kuwa ku gaalooba Aayadaha Rabbigood iyo la kulankiisa26. Marka camalladooda waa buraan. Sidaas awgeed uma yeelno wax miisaan iyo qiimo ah Maalinta Qiyaamaha.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلِقَآئِهِۦ فَحَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَزۡنٗا
footnotes: 26. Waxay diidaan inay dhageystaan Qur’aanka ama fahmaan oo waxay beeniyaan Maalinta Dambe ‘ Aakhirada’.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna kafarū biāyāti rabbihim waliqāihi faḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum falā nuqīmu lahum yawma al-qiyāmati waznan
